_header: In a wilderness an hermit found
_description: The Hermit and the Angel, in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
I awyldernes on hermett fandOn ded body fowll
                    stynkand…

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
IN Wildernesse an hermyte fandA ded monnes bodi
                    stinkand…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:

                    lede. amen.
